tree: This is the magical learning tree!
Trees are homes for birds and squirrels. They give us oxygen!
tree_facts: An old oak tree can live for hundreds of years.
Leaves make food for the tree using sunlight.
river: This is a fresh river — animals drink from it!
Rivers carry water across the forest and feed plants.
river_facts: Rivers are full of tiny creatures like insects and fish.
Clean water is important for all living things.
fox: Mr. Fox loves stories and hiding games.
Foxes are clever and notice little things in the forest.
fox_facts: Foxes use their tails for balance and warmth.
A fox's hearing is very sharp.
bunny: Bunny loves carrots! Want to help find one?
Bunnies are quiet and quick — they hop a lot.
bunny_facts: Bunnies make soft burrows to live in.
They have long ears to hear far away sounds.
star: You found a secret star! Great job!
Stars help us unlock fun rewards in the game.
random: Buzz buzz! Tap a tree, river, or animal to learn something!
I can ask you a small question or tell a fun fact — try clicking an icon!
